oai_dc:dc.dc:title: One of City’s busiest coal firms, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo, published in the Nashville Times (1940), about the Brazil Coal Company. The business is cited in the 1941 City Directory, located at 705 19th Avenue N, Frank. H. Brazil. Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Brazil, Frank H.
Brazil Coal (Nashville, Tenn.)
